text:
üüß Mothercare shop is a British-based retailer that specialises in products for expectant mothers and in general merchandise for children up to 8 years of age.

üî∑Ô∏è Was browsing through the kids' clothes on sale and find the designs to be lovely. The material and texture of the clothing was also of good quality.

I would like to express my heartfelt thanks to Wen Mun at Mothercare for her outstanding professionalism and dedication. She went above and beyond to assist me with clearing the tax refund and ensuring I fully understood the promotion items. Wen Mun was incredibly patient, taking the time to address all my concerns and making the entire process smooth and stress-free. Her exceptional service truly made a positive impression, and I deeply appreciate her efforts. Thank you, Wen Mun, for your excellent support!

Very strange shop, no service, 2 or 3 cashiers just chit chat sth and laugh loudly, even customer need assistant, there's no concern received. The transaction process is not smooth, one cashier is blur and another cashier is overreacted emotionally. Anyway, just bought gift for friend and moved. Overall, it is an uncomfortable shopping experience.
Great service, ms. Wen Mun helped us to choose the right pregnancy/maternity belt and showed us other products as well.

Jovel was fantastic when it comes to customer service. The item I needed was not available but she checked with other stores, found one, took the trouble to collect and transfer it to her outlet (as it was most convenient for me) so I could it. Well done!
